attributes.logicalName: Basel Asset Class Level Zero Code
attributes.gcd: This columns stores the Level 0 code of the Basel Asset Class. The Basel Asset Classes are the jurisdiction specific asset classes, which are defined based on the various combination of the standard party type, Basel product type and other additional filter conditions. This level 0 indicates a logical low level of grouping of the various jurisdiction specific asset classes available in Basel Asset Class dimension.

attributes.logicalName: Basel Asset Class Level Zero Description
attributes.gcd: This columns stores the Level 0 description of the Basel Asset Class. The Basel Asset Classes are the jurisdiction specific asset classes, which are defined based on the various combination of the standard party type, Basel product type and other additional filter conditions. This level 0 indicates a logical low level of grouping of the various jurisdiction specific asset classes available in Basel Asset Class Dimension.
Refers to the equivalent numeric identifier of the Basel Asset Class Numeric Identifier.

Refers to the source system from where data is extracted. Data can be sourced from multiple sources, this column will Refers to the source code from where the data is extracted for this extraction date.

Flag indicates whether the given dimension value record has been disabled or expired. The list of values includes Y- Indicates that the dimension value has been disabled, N- Indicates that the dimension value is not disabled and is still active.
Refers to the record creation date. It has been added to all catalog entities to enable partitioning and archival.
It Indicates if dimension record is seeded by product or not. The SCD component would not overwrite the record if it is set to 'Y'.
